setting_row.description: Enter the default uploads directory to store the media manager uploaded files in. Defaults to /uploads

setting_row.title: Maximum Number of participants
setting_row.description: Enter the maximum allowed number of participants per personal message

setting_row.title: Additional Participant Roles Select
setting_row.description: Choose the permissions roles that users with that roles will be shown in the TO select box

setting_row.title: Maintenance Status
setting_row.description: Turn maintenance mode on/off

setting_row.title: Maintenance Mode Message
setting_row.description: Enter a message that will be displayed when the application is in maintenance mode
setting_row.default_value: The site is currently under maintenance! Please check back soon.
setting_row.value: The site is currently under maintenance! Please check back soon.

setting_row.title: Maintenance Roles Override
setting_row.description: Select the roles that are allowed to view the application while in maintenance mode

setting_row.title: Staff Message
setting_row.description: Enter a message that will be displayed in the dashboard under staff message tab

setting_row.title: Admin Logged In Time
setting_row.description: Enter the number of hours a user will stay logged in to the admin panel (in hours, Defaults to 5)

setting_row.title: Home Page Title
setting_row.description: Enter the title that will appear between the title tags when viewing the site home page

setting_row.title: Home Page Meta Desription
setting_row.description: Enter the meta description that will appear when viewing the site home page

setting_row.title: Home Page Meta Keywords
setting_row.description: Enter the meta keywords that will appear when viewing the site home page

setting_row.title: Global Meta Description
setting_row.description: Enter the meta description that will appear when viewing a page that has no meta description set

setting_row.title: Global Meta Keywords
setting_row.description: Enter the meta keywords that will appear when viewing a page that has no meta keywords set

setting_row.title: Robots Text File
setting_row.description: Enter the contents for the robots.txt file {message}

setting_row.title: Global Time Zone
setting_row.description: Select the system default time zone

setting_row.title: Content Cache
setting_row.description: Choose the type of content cache you'd like to use to cache static content (HTML Pages for example)

setting_row.title: Data Cache
setting_row.description: Choose the type of data cache you'd like to use to cache data (settings, php variables etc...)

setting_row.title: Memcache Servers
setting_row.description:
Enter the list of servers to use when the cache content or cache data is memcache.
Example:
serverAddress:Port:Weight
127.0.0.1: 11211:60

setting_row.title: Global Editor Type
setting_row.description: Choose the type of editor you'd like to use when editing rich content

setting_row.title: IP Block
setting_row.description: Enter the IP addresses you'd like to block from accessing the entire application. This includes the admin panel so be careful with entering your IP address as you'll need to update the setting through the DB afterwards.

setting_row.title: Redirect Blocked IP URL Address
setting_row.description: Enter the URL address the blocked IPs will be redirected to. Defaults to http://google.com

setting_row.title: Default Language
setting_row.description: Choose the site default language from the supported installed languages

setting_row.title: Ajax Check Messages Interval
setting_row.description: Select the time in seconds that will run an ajax call to check for new Personal Messages. Select none if you dont want to check Personal Messages via ajax.
setting_row.extra: 0=None 30=30 Seconds 60=1 Minute 120=2 Minutes 300=5 Minutes 600=10 Minutes 1200=20 Minutes 3600=1 Hour

setting_row.title: Default Theme
setting_row.description: Choose the default theme used in the site
